title: The Mentalist
overview: When mentalist Patrick Jane insults a vengeful serial killer, Red John, his loved ones are brutally killed.  Faced with the horrifying consequences of misusing his gift for observation and misdirection, Jane lends his skills to the California Bureau of Investigation, all the while hoping that his connections within the CBI will give him the opportunity to track down and revenge himself upon Red John.

episodes.title: The Desert Rose
episodes.overview: Jane and Lisbon secretly continue their mission to narrow down the list of seven Red John suspects as they investigate the murder of a man who was missing for two years.

episodes.title: Black-Winged Redbird
episodes.overview: Jane discovers an important clue to Red John’s methods as the team encounters four of the suspects while the CBI investigates the case of a software engineer whose car spontaneously exploded.

episodes.title: Wedding in Red
episodes.overview: Jane gets the CBI involved in a case in Napa in order to focus on Sheriff McAllister, while Van Pelt and Rigsby take a trip down the aisle.

episodes.title: Red Listed
episodes.overview: Jane reveals that a list of fake Red John suspects he planted was stolen, and the team realizes these men are in danger.

episodes.title: The Red Tattoo
episodes.overview: When a prominent member of Visualize is mysteriously killed, Jane investigates in the hopes that the case will provide a clue that will lead him to Red John.

episodes.title: Fire and Brimstone
episodes.overview: With the final clue in hand, Jane attempts to gather the remaining Red John suspects in one place in hopes of finally revealing his identity.

episodes.title: The Great Red Dragon
episodes.overview: Following the shocking events at Jane’s house, the Red John list is narrowed down further, and the CBI’s priority is the remaining suspects.

episodes.title: Red John
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane finally comes face-to-face with Red John, the serial killer he’s tracked since the madman murdered his wife and daughter. For 10 years, Jane has doggedly hunted his nemesis in his search for justice.

episodes.title: My Blue Heaven
episodes.overview: Two years after the Red John case was closed, Jane receives a surprising job offer that could change his life.

episodes.title: Green Thumb
episodes.overview: The FBI reluctantly enlists Jane’s help to find a missing computer programmer, but he won’t help unless Lisbon is brought on board as well.

episodes.title: White Lines
episodes.overview: The FBI is tasked with finding the killer of several DEA agents, and Jane goes on a date with a beautiful woman associated with the case.

episodes.title: The Golden Hammer
episodes.overview: Jane and the FBI investigate the murder of a high-tech cartographer who may have unearthed a spy ring before his death. Meanwhile, Rigsby and Van Pelt find themselves on the trail of an alarming conspiracy.

episodes.title: Black Helicopters
episodes.overview: Jane’s investigation leads him to join a separatist commune after a U.S. attorney is found dead in Mexico, even though there’s no record of her crossing the border. Also, Rigsby and Van Pelt convince JJ LaRoche to help them discover who is stalking former CBI members.

episodes.title: Grey Water
episodes.overview: Jane and Fischer investigate a murder at an oil fracking site, while Rigsby and Van Pelt travel to Austin to help investigate suspects in the string of attacks on former CBI team members.

episodes.title: White as the Driven Snow
episodes.overview: Grace is kidnapped by the killer who has been hunting former CBI members, but when the prime suspect appears to have an airtight alibi, Jane must rely on all his skills to locate her before time runs out.

episodes.title: Violets
episodes.overview: Jane enlists his colleagues in a dangerous sting operation to catch a deadly team of art thieves. Meanwhile, sparks fly between Lisbon and an agent from the FBI’s art squad.

episodes.title: The Red Glass Bead
episodes.overview: While Jane tries to decipher Lorelei’s connection to Red John, the CBI team is forced to partner with the FBI to solve the murder of a hotel employee.

episodes.title: Devil's Cherry
episodes.overview: While the team investigates the murder of a diamond cutter, Jane meets a girl who claims to be his late daughter, Charlotte.

episodes.title: Not One Red Cent
episodes.overview: A bank employee is murdered during a heist and Jane and team must work to track down the killer, while Lisbon is pulled deeper into the CBI/FBI rivalry.

episodes.title: Blood Feud
episodes.overview: When Rigsby’s father is found injured at a crime scene, the team must find out if it is the result of a long-standing small-town gang war.

episodes.title: Red Dawn
episodes.overview: See how Jane met Lisbon and the rest of the CBI team for the first time.

episodes.title: Cherry Picked
episodes.overview: The team investigates the kidnapping of a couple that may be the victim of mistaken identity, while Jane continues his investigation into Lorelei's whereabouts.

episodes.title: If It Bleeds, It Leads
episodes.overview: The team investigates the murder of a reporter who may have become too close to her story, while Jane insists on pursuing his own leads to find Lorelei.

episodes.title: Red Sails in the Sunset
episodes.overview: With the help of Brett Stiles, Jane orchestrates an elaborate plan to break Lorelei Martins out of prison in the hopes of her leading him to Red John.

episodes.title: Black Cherry
episodes.overview: The CBI team investigates the murder of a real estate agent with former gang ties, while Jane searches for leads on his new connection to Red John.

episodes.title: Panama Red
episodes.overview: The death of a young botanist leads the team into the lucrative world of medical marijuana, while Cho’s work with the rapid response team brings him back into contact with Summer.

episodes.title: Days of Wine & Roses
episodes.overview: The CBI team visits a high-end California rehab center in order to investigate the death of a young model who was a patient there, while Lisbon ramps up her investigation into Tommy Volker.

episodes.title: Little Red Corvette
episodes.overview: Lisbon believes that the death of a geologist is the key to bringing down Tommy Volker, while Jane looks into the disappearance of a young boy.

episodes.title: The Red Barn
episodes.overview: The team investigates a 25-year-old case that seems to involve both Red John and the Visualize group, and Lisbon contemplates her future.

episodes.title: Red in Tooth and Claw
episodes.overview: The team delves into the surprisingly cutthroat world of academics in a case involving a graduate student at a natural history museum.

episodes.title: Red Lacquer Nail Polish
episodes.overview: The remains of an elderly heiress are uncovered in her eerie mansion, and the CBI have a long list of suspects for her homicide.

episodes.title: There Will Be Blood
episodes.overview: Lorelei resurfaces and wants to know if Red John is linked to her sister's death. Meanwhile, Jane must admit to Lisbon that he played a role in Lorelei's jailbreak.

episodes.title: Red, White and Blue
episodes.overview: A female Army medic who worked with soldiers with post-traumatic stress disorder is found dead near a military base.

episodes.title: Behind the Red Curtain
episodes.overview: When the lead in the local theatre production dies, the CBI is called on to investigate. Jane is determined to question comatose Jason Lennon about Red John.

episodes.title: Red Letter Day
episodes.overview: The CBI team heads out to a run-down Wild West tourist town to investigate the death of the town's owner. Meanwhile, Kirkland tries to uncover the extent of Jane's knowledge about Red John.

episodes.title: Red Velvet Cupcakes
episodes.overview: Rigsby and Van Pelt go undercover as a couple with relationship problems to investigate the death of a woman who received advice from a radio love doctor.

episodes.title: Red and Itchy
episodes.overview: J.J. LaRoche personally requests Jane’s help when the mysterious container he’s been hiding for nine years is stolen from his home.

episodes.title: Red John's Rules
episodes.overview: Just as Jane narrows down the Red John suspect list to seven, Red John strikes again, and the victim has a link to Jane’s past.

episodes.title: Scarlet Ribbons
episodes.overview: After being imprisoned Patrick Jane has to prove that the man he shot really was Red John. Meanwhile Lisbon is trying to persuade Van Pelt to seek counseling in the aftermath of her fiancé's death.

episodes.title: Little Red Book
episodes.overview: The CBI has a new supervising agent, Ray Haffner, while Patrick Jane is trying to get his team back together.

episodes.title: Pretty Red Balloon
episodes.overview: A former client, who still believes that Jane was a psychic, asks for help when her son is kidnapped.

episodes.title: Ring Around the Rosie
episodes.overview: While Lisbon looks into the death of a photographer at a political rally, Jane has his sights set on proving a man carrying a gun at the same rally is a psychopath with murder on his mind.

episodes.title: Blood and Sand
episodes.overview: The CBI team investigates the murder of a woman whose corpse washed up on an island off the coast of California. Rigsby worries that his relationship with a public defender will create awkwardness between him and Van Pelt.

episodes.title: Where in the World is Carmine O'Brien
episodes.overview: While trying to solve the murder of a police chief Lisbon runs into her brother Tommy, a bounty hunter, who's tracking a bail jumper.

episodes.title: Blinking Red Light
episodes.overview: The search for a serial killer hits close to home for Jane when he encounters a blogger who has devoted his life to finding the killer

episodes.title: Pink Tops
episodes.overview: In order to find the killer of an undercover narcotics cop, Jane and the CBI team retrace her investigation. Samaire Armstrong (“Dirty Sexy Money”) guest stars as Summer Edgecombe, a prostitute who helps Cho with the investigation. Dean Norris (“Breaking Bad”) guest stars as Sergeant Don Henderson.

episodes.title: The Redshirt
episodes.overview: Jane and Lisbon are investigating the murder of an NFL star who was blown up in a car explosion while Rigsby and Harrigan take their relationship to the next level.

episodes.title: Fugue In Red
episodes.overview: Jane almost drowns while investigating a fireman's murder and loses his memory, turning him into his old con man self.

episodes.title: Always Bet on Red
episodes.overview: Jane and the CBI team narrow down the long list of suspects after a high-end divorce attorney, with many enemies, is killed on his speed boat. Meanwhile, Jane is questioned by Agent Darcy about whether Red John was responsible for Panzer's murder.

episodes.title: My Bloody Valentine
episodes.overview: With very little evidence, Jane and the CBI investigate the death of a mob boss’ son. Meanwhile, while taking an eyewitness in for questioning, Van Pelt is haunted by the memories of O’Laughlin’s shooting.

episodes.title: Red is the New Black
episodes.overview: Jane and the CBI narrow down the list of suspects after a disgraced clothing designer on the verge of a comeback becomes a fashion victim. Meanwhile, FBI Agent Darcy continues her investigation into finding Red John.

episodes.title: At First Blush
episodes.overview: While a jury deliberates the guilt or innocence of a defendant on trial for murder, Jane tries to prove she has been wrongfully accused before time runs out. Meanwhile, Summer may have gone too far when she helps Cho make a case against a suspect.

episodes.title: War of the Roses
episodes.overview: When a charity worker is killed, Jane has Erica Flynn, a murderer he helped imprison, furloughed in exchange for information she claims to have about the case. Meanwhile, Rigsby and Sarah try to adjust to impending parenthood.

episodes.title: His Thoughts Were Red Thoughts
episodes.overview: Jane is reunited with his former nemesis, cult leader Bret Stiles, when the head of an anti-cult activist organization is murdered.

episodes.title: Cheap Burgundy
episodes.overview: When Agent Susan Darcy asks Jane for help with an investigation, he suspects her motives; the team handles the murder of a woman who was killed after meeting someone in a chat room.

episodes.title: Ruddy Cheeks
episodes.overview: Jane and the team investigate when a terminally ill salesman is murdered; Cho must face his demons.

episodes.title: Pink Champagne on Ice
episodes.overview: While investigating the murder of a casino employee, Jane runs into a stage magician he used to tour with during his time as a mentalist and discovers he is hiding a shocking secret.

episodes.title: Something's Rotten in Redmund
episodes.overview: The CBI team tries to determine who would have reason to kill a popular English teacher.

episodes.title: Ruby Slippers
episodes.overview: Jane and the CBI try to find the killer of a man found outside a cabaret featuring female impersonators. During the investigation they discover a list of suspects, all of whom bullied the victim.

episodes.title: So Long, and Thanks for All the Red Snapper
episodes.overview: The investigation into the death of a surfer reunites Lisbon with her former fiancé. Cho is beginning to question why he's with Summer.

episodes.title: Red Rover, Red Rover
episodes.overview: Red John taunts Jane on the ninth anniversary of his wife and daughter's death. With Jane's attention diverted and his concentration wavering, the current investigation and his CBI career are put at risk.

episodes.title: The Crimson Hat
episodes.overview: After another failed attempt to defeat Red John, Patrick Jane hits rock bottom, finds a lover and shoots one of his own.

episodes.title: Red Sky at Night
episodes.overview: After his encounter with Red John, Patrick rethinks his future with the CBI. At the same time, the team investigates two high-profile kidnappings.

episodes.title: Cackle-Bladder Blood
episodes.overview: When Jane's shady brother-in-law (Kevin Rankin) comes to town and becomes a suspect in a murder investigation, Jane is forced to help him.

episodes.title: The Blood on His Hands
episodes.overview: When Patrick Jane faces off once again with cult leader Bret Stiles, Stiles offers Jane information regarding Red John and the missing Kristina Frye.

episodes.title: Red Carpet Treatment
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane and the CBI team are called in to investigate the murder of a convict who served nine years for rape and murder, but was recently released on DNA evidence.

episodes.title: The Red Ponies
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane and the CBI team hit the horse track when a jockey is found murdered and suspects abound.

episodes.title: Pink Chanel Suit
episodes.overview: The case of a murder and missing person on a secure compound perplexes the CBI team.

episodes.title: Red Hot
episodes.overview: A building explodes while Patrick Jane and the team are investigating a death threat; Libson once again runs into billionaire Walter Mashburn (Currie Graham).

episodes.title: Ball of Fire
episodes.overview: When Jane is kidnapped, Lisbon and the team realize there are many suspects who might want to harm him.

episodes.title: Red Moon
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane accepts the help of a local astrologer, Ellis Mars, to solve the puzzling case of a triple homicide that involves two policemen and the fiancé of an EMT worker.

episodes.title: Jolly Red Elf
episodes.overview: The CBI pursues two lines of investigation when a Santa is murdered: Patrick Jane goes undercover in an AA group; and Rigsby and Van Pelt question members of an authentic Santa society. Meanwhile, following the demise of a person in custody at the CBI, J.J. LaRoche is brought in to question the team when it appears to be an inside job.

episodes.title: Bloodsport
episodes.overview: Patrick and the team investigate the murder of a woman with ties to one of the fighters. Meanwhile, LaRoche focuses his investigation on Rigsby, who in turn is forced to ask Cho for a huge favor in order to keep his job.

episodes.title: Bloodhounds
episodes.overview: The team works with a criminal profiler on a double-murder case, and it turns into a contest for Jane, who tries to prove that his way of solving the case is better.

episodes.title: Red Alert
episodes.overview: When Patrick Jane and others are taken hostage by an armed man accused of murder, Jane must think quickly to defuse the situation.

episodes.title: Blood for Blood
episodes.overview: When a witness under Van Pelt's protection is killed, her position within the CBI comes into question.

episodes.title: Red Gold
episodes.overview: When a modern-day prospector is found dead near a mining site and Lisbon is injured during the initial stages of the investigation, Agent Hightower joins Patrick Jane in the field for the first time.

episodes.title: Red Queen
episodes.overview: The CBI team is under suspicion when a museum antiques dealer is murdered. Evidence seems to suggest that one member of the team is responsible.

episodes.title: Bloodstream
episodes.overview: A doctor is found murdered on a golf course, and the team thinks the killer's in a hospital. Meanwhile, LaRoche takes over CBI and names Cho as the team leader.

episodes.title: The Red Mile
episodes.overview: A man who claims to have been abducted by aliens is murdered and his body is stolen from the coroner's van. Van Pelt moves ahead with her wedding plans.

episodes.title: Every Rose Has Its Thorn
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane sets out to prove a beautiful yet manipulative matchmaker shot and killed her husband after his body is found floating in the marina.

episodes.title: Redacted
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane's life just got complicated. He's presented with two robberies gone bad and one of them involves Donny Culpepper, a former suspect, who Jane hired to get into LaRoche's house.

episodes.title: Like a Redheaded Stepchild
episodes.overview: When a prison guard is stabbed to death outside of a jewelry store, Patrick Jane suspects one of the guard's inmates is the killer. Meanwhile, Rigsby questions his own father about the murder.

episodes.title: Rhapsody in Red
episodes.overview: After a young violinist is shot to death, Patrick Jane questions the members of the Northern California Symphony Orchestra about the murder. Meanwhile, Cho crosses paths with a precocious young pickpocket.

episodes.title: Strawberries and Cream (1)
episodes.overview: John's mole in the CBI is revealed and Patrick Jane finally meets Red John in an explosive confrontation with shocking repercussions for the CBI team.

episodes.title: Strawberries and Cream (2)
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane finally meets Red John in an explosive confrontation with shocking repercussions for the CBI team.

episodes.title: Redemption
episodes.overview: Jane and Lisbon learn that the Red John case has been reassigned to a different CBI team led by the straight-shooting officer Sam Bosco.

episodes.title: The Scarlet Letter
episodes.overview: Lisbon and the team work the case of a State Senator's murdered intern, while Jane simultaneously tries to find out what new information Bosco has uncovered on the Red John case.

episodes.title: Red Badge
episodes.overview: Jane, Cho, Rigsby and Van Pelt decide to conduct their own investigation when Lisbon is accused of murdering a child molester she arrested who was recently paroled.

episodes.title: Red Menace
episodes.overview: Jane and the CBI investigate the murder of Gordon Hodge, a powerful attorney, who is responsible for allowing a vicious murderer, Van McBride, to walk away a free man.

episodes.title: Red Scare
episodes.overview: Jane and the CBI team are called in to investigate the death of a prominent architect found murdered in a crumbling old mansion, and there appears to be a number of suspects.

episodes.title: Black Gold and Red Blood
episodes.overview: Jane's overstepping of the law finally lands him in prison but doesn't hurt his style at all.

episodes.title: Red Bulls
episodes.overview: Minelli orders Patrick Jane and Lisbon and company to play nice and work together with Bosco and his team to locate a kidnapped woman being held for ransom.

episodes.title: His Red Right Hand
episodes.overview: The CBI team is faced with a violent and shocking crime in their own office, but must work the case in spite of their alarm of who may be behind it. Meanwhile, Rigsby and Van Pelt are definitely an "item".

episodes.title: A Price Above Rubies
episodes.overview: A jewel heist during a charity event leaves a man lingering near death but the investigation takes a bizare turn when the chief suspect winds up dead.

episodes.title: Throwing Fire
episodes.overview: While Jane and the team examine the crime scene where a baseball scout is found murdered, Jane is clocked in the head by a ball and flashes back to his childhood with his overbearing father.

episodes.title: Rose-Colored Glasses
episodes.overview: Jane and company investigate the murder of a man and his wife, on her way to his fifteen year high school reunion where, clearly, the attendees haven't changed all that much.

episodes.title: Bleeding Heart
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane and the team investigate the murder of a mayor's aide, and Rigsby and Van Pelt make a big announcement.

episodes.title: Redline
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane and the CBI team investigate when the body of a high-end luxury car sales woman is found in the trunk of a Bentley in the dealership's showroom.

episodes.title: Blood In, Blood Out
episodes.overview: When a member of Cho's former gang, the Avon Park Playboys, is found murdered, Patrick Jane insists on helping Cho with his off-the-books investigation.

episodes.title: Red Herring
episodes.overview: Jane and the team investigate the murder of an arrogant chef during a cooking competition in Napa Valley.

episodes.title: Code Red
episodes.overview: When Dr. Alicia Seberg, a government research scientist, is exposed to a deadly toxin while at work and has only hours to live, she calls Patrick Jane and the CBI to find her murderer.

episodes.title: The Red Box
episodes.overview: Patrick and the CBI team investigate the murder of a tutor, and find a mysterious little red box near the body, starting a chain of events that turns the murder into the search for a priceless ring stolen from the British Museum. Meanwhile, Lisbon is worried when a new boss, Madeleine Hightower, takes command of the CBI, as well as mysteriously learning about Rigsby and Van Pelt's relationship.

episodes.title: Aingavite Baa
episodes.overview: When a "Jane Doe" with amnesia and covered in blood steps in front of Cho and Van Pelt's car, Patrick Jane must use all of his skills to discover who she is, her last location and why she lost her memory

episodes.title: Blood Money
episodes.overview: When Patrick Jane's sneaky conduct causes the case of a confessed hitman to be tossed out of court, his annoyed CBI team must start the investigation over from scratch.

episodes.title: Red All Over
episodes.overview: When a media mogul is murdered, Patrick Jane and the CBI team investigate cult leader Bret Stiles, who may have had an axe to grind following the publication of a critical story about his group
Patrick Jane and the CBI team investigate the death of a mathematical genius by a gun-wielding clown.

episodes.title: Red Letter
episodes.overview: Romantic sparks begin to fly when Patrick Jane and supposed psychic Kristina Frye cross paths again during the CBI investigation into the murder of a charismatic head of a non-profit organization that fights human trafficking.

episodes.title: Red Sky in the Morning
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane and Kristina's first date is interrupted by a report of Red John striking again, which is discovered to be a copycat. But when Kristina reaches out to the real Red John, both she and Jane find themselves in grave danger.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: This episode introduces us to the complex life of Patrick Jane, a police detective with a troubled past who has a keen eye for detail. When a man and woman are found dead in their home, many believe they are victims of a serial killer, but Patrick knows better and must prove that this was not the work of Red John.

episodes.title: Red Hair and Silver Tape
episodes.overview: Jane orchestrates his own undercover operation using Van Pelt as bait as the team investigates the murder of a young waitress in the Napa Valley.

episodes.title: Red Tide
episodes.overview: When a body washes ashore on the beach, Patrick sets a trap to determine and catch the killer out of a group of surfers.

episodes.title: Ladies in Red
episodes.overview: The team discovers that a wealthy investment banker found murdered inside his locked safe room was living a dual life and stealing from his clients; Patrick plays the suspects to see which will show their true colors.

episodes.title: Redwood
episodes.overview: A girl found covered in blood with the murder weapon in her grasp is the obvious suspect in her best friend's death, but the girl remembers nothing about the incident and Jane believes she is innocent.

episodes.title: Red Handed
episodes.overview: Jane uses the murder investigation of a casino owner as an opportunity to win at the blackjack table.

episodes.title: Seeing Red
episodes.overview: Patrick stages a seance to prove that a supposed psychic, who predicted that a murder victim was in danger, is a fake and a killer.

episodes.title: The Thin Red Line
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane sees his own suspect, with a different motive, when the police believe a drug dealer on trial killed both his girlfriend and the State's witness in the case.

episodes.title: Flame Red
episodes.overview: A murder in a small town is investigated and soon turns out to be an act of vengeance.

episodes.title: Red Brick and Ivy
episodes.overview: Patrick takes a personal interest in the case of a poisoned professor when he discovers the prime suspect is his former psychiatrist.

episodes.title: Red John's Friends
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane, enticed by the promise from a convicted murder that he'll reveal information about Red John upon his release, becomes singularly focused and quits the CBI in order to prove the prisoner is innocent.

episodes.title: Red Rum
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane sets a mentalist trap to find out who is responsible for the murder of a high school boy who antagonized the local self-proclaimed witch by killing her cat.

episodes.title: Paint It Red
episodes.overview: While it appears obvious that a business tycoon's son-in-law was in on the robbery of a $50 million painting since his body is found where the painting once hung, Patrick Jane suspects others, including a Russian oil baron, an art forger and an art curator.

episodes.title: Crimson Casanova
episodes.overview: Patrick helps Cho go under cover as a ladies man in an attempt to catch a killer with his own set of pseudo-mentalist techniques.

episodes.title: Scarlett Fever
episodes.overview: As Jane and the team investigate the poisoning death of the "queen bee" in a country club, they discover that the community is full of secrets, including love affairs and drug abuse

episodes.title: Bloodshot
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane must rely on his other senses during the murder investigation of a financial advisor when he loses his sight as a result of an explosion.

episodes.title: Carnelian Inc.
episodes.overview: When a mysterious malcontent threatens the lives of the top executives at Carnelian, Inc., a conglomerate noted for its rapacious business practices, authorities initially dismiss the communication as a hoax until the company's personnel director plummets to his death at Jane's feet during a skydiving exercise.

episodes.title: Russet Potatoes
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane and the CBI team track down a mastermind who hypnotizes people into doing their bidding.

episodes.title: A Dozen Red Roses
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane and the team go to Hollywood when they investigate the murder of a movie producer.

episodes.title: Red Sauce
episodes.overview: Jane and the CBI set out to determine who is responsible for the Mob-style execution of a man in the Witness Protection Program.

episodes.title: Miss Red
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane uses his mentalist skills to play suspects off each other in order to solve the case of a wealthy software company CEO found murdered on his yacht.

episodes.title: Blood Brothers
episodes.overview: Patrick Jane, Agent Lisbon and the CBI Team investigate the murder of a student in a wilderness program for troubled kids. Patrick Jane must find a clever way to convince the troubled kids at a wilderness program to confide in him about what really happened surrounding the death of one of their peers.

episodes.title: Red John's Footsteps
episodes.overview: As the CBI investigates the murder of a young girl and the abduction of her twin sister, Lisbon suspects that Red John is trying to draw Jane into a trap.

episodes.title: Cracking The Crystal Ball - Mentalist Vs Psychic
episodes.overview: The question of superior mental acuity vs. keen observation

episodes.title: Evidence of a Hit Series
episodes.overview: Interviews with the cast and creator

episodes.title: Blood In, Blood Out: Lost Evidence
The Mentalist: Portrait of a Serial Killer - Red John
The Artistry of Action: From Script to Screen
Arresting Excitement: Keeping it Real with the CBI
